headers.subject: [tosdr:2903] Gittip: [Good] Privacy policy is easy to read

subject: Gittip: [Good] Privacy policy is easy to read
text:
Title: [Good] Privacy policy is easy to read
Topic: readability
Summary: The policy is in plain English and uses few difficult-to-understand clauses.
Score: 100

Note: This is a part of the series of ratings as a part of gittip issue #1898.

https://github.com/gittip/www.gittip.com/issues/1898

References:

Gittip Terms of Service 

https://www.gittip.com/about/terms/

Gittip Privacy Policy

https://www.gittip.com/about/privacy/
